---
title: "COVID-19 Dashboard"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

# Simulate COVID data
covid_data <- tibble(
  date = seq.Date(as.Date("2020-01-01"), by="month", length.out=24),
  cases = cumsum(rpois(24, lambda=500))
)

plot_ly(covid_data, x=~date, y=~cases, type='scatter', mode='lines+markers')
